Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentelmen, ATLAS Corporation is proud to present: 

The Luftkreuzer-class Air Battleship

Now, you may be thinking: What's an Air Battleship? Well, it's something i have completely made up. So, basically, it's a massive zeppelin with naval cannons on it. That's the best i can describe it. Currently the only one of this model in service is the K.A.B. Behemoth, packing (4) 12.7 cm Medium Naval Cannons, and (8) 20mm quad barrel flak cannons. The use for this class of ship is to provide heavy support from the air in a fleet of similar ships, though those are still in development. She's powered by (8) counter-rotating KAS propellers mounted and scaled up to 200% via tweakscale. This whole ship is longer than the SPH. An idea early in-development was to utilize the ship's massive internal bay as a hangar for aircraft, but that was split into a second design, the Luftbehalter-class. Link coming soon!

9 hours ago, Redshift OTF said:

Woah, that's some deadly firepower you have there. How does it fly?

She's a bit... sensitive. To keep her from spontaneously exploding, i had to use cheats, but speed and maneuverability-wise, she's pretty good at turning. The naval cannons are slow to turn, though, so a hovering gun attack might be a better approach.
